product_overview: Fiestapp is a premium web application designed for comprehensive event organization, specifically built for managing a 70th birthday party. It centralizes guest management, detailed budget tracking with individual payments, and task logistics into one interactive platform with real-time data updates.
core_goals: Centralize all event management aspects into a single platform for ease of use and efficiency.
Provide real-time visualization and status updates on guests, budget, and tasks to enhance event oversight.
Enable detailed budget control including expense tracking and partial payments from multiple responsible parties.
Facilitate effortless guest management including attendance tracking and status changes.
Support logistic task management with immediate update capabilities.
Offer export functionality for reports in Excel and PDF formats for external review and record keeping.
key_features: Dashboard header with real-time metrics and visualization toggles excluding canceled guests from totals.
Guest management with add, edit, delete functions, status change dropdown using React Portals for UI consistency, and data export capabilities.
Expense management including form for adding/editing expenses, payment tracking per responsible person, automated progress visualization, and export options.
Task management allowing marking tasks as completed/uncompleted with instant database synchronization and task deletion.
Robust form validation for guest and expense forms following predefined schemas with live feedback on validation rules.
SPA architecture with Next.js routing and tab-based navigation for Guests, Budget, and Logistics sections.
Integration with Supabase as backend for real-time data operations including selections, inserts, updates, and deletes.
Export service functionality enabling export of guest and expense data into Excel and PDF formats.
UX states coverage including loading, empty data messaging, error handling via TanStack Query, and success state feedback through modal closures.
user_flow_summary: User logs into the Fiestapp SPA and lands on the Dashboard home view displaying real-time event overview metrics.
User navigates to the Guests tab to add a new guest, update attendance status, and verify changes reflected on the Dashboard.
User accesses the Budget tab to create expenses, record partial and full payments by different responsible individuals, and monitor budget progress visually.
User utilizes the Logistics tab to mark tasks as completed or pending and deletes completed tasks as necessary with immediate update feedback.
User exports guest and expense data to Excel or PDF format for reporting or sharing purposes.
validation_criteria: All forms enforce schema validations with required fields and minimum character/integer limits as per the defined specs.
Status changes and data updates are immediately reflected on the UI and persisted in Supabase backend.
Real-time progress bars accurately represent payment statuses in the Budget section.
Exported reports in Excel and PDF formats accurately reflect current data shown in the application.
Loading, empty, error, and success UI states are appropriately handled to provide clear user feedback.
All interactive elements including dropdowns for status changes remain fully accessible and functional across the application.
The application functions as a single-page app with seamless tab navigation and state management.
Data integrity is maintained for guest lists, expenses, and task items throughout CRUD operations.
